# 1981 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1981 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1982 for the 1981 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1981 are as follows.
